sentences.english: The third of these will destroy evil and bring forth the reign of righteousness.
sentences.chinese: 第三，這一切都不會摧毀邪惡帶來腥風血雨的正義。

sentences.english: And a man was killed since ancient times in the reign of battlefield, seize power.
sentences.chinese: 而男人自古就是殺死戰場，腥風血雨中奪取權勢。

sentences.english: Therefore, each group and opened the battles the reign of terror.
sentences.chinese: 爲此，各個集團又展開了腥風血雨的殊死搶奪。

sentences.english: Her mantra, always set off the television industry " bloodbath."
sentences.chinese: 她的咒語，總能掀起電視行業的“腥風血雨”。

sentences.english: The reign of Christ over mankind will be the sequel of the General Judgment.
sentences.chinese: 腥風血雨的基督超過人類，將在續集中的一般判斷。

impossible to unravel/confusing
